title: L1/PHY Software Engineer
summary: Are you a fearless thinker? Do you love the challenge of advancing wireless technologies? Are you passionate about innovation that can enrich user experience and delight customers?  Do you get excited with constant challenges and thrive in a culture of debate? In the Wireless Wireless Technologies and Ecosystems Group, you will help commercialize groundbreaking Wireless Technologies in Apple products. You’ll design, develop, and patent the next generation of our state-of-the art wireless technologies. You’ll collaborate across departments to help craft wireless solutions that elevate the customer experience with Apple products and services. Our goal is to ensure nothing stands in the way of our customers’ connections with their devices. If you join us, you’ll help build world-renowned wireless systems so seamless that they almost feel like magic.
description: We are looking for passionate engineers who are driven to question the limitations of what is feasible to develop the next generation of absolute best-in-class Apple products. Such engineers with cellular systems and/or firmware development experience will be part of an innovative team that work on L1/PHY layer of 4G/5G modem that go into a range of Apple products. The position involves identifying and/or developing core cellular technologies that solve everyday problems for customers using Apple wireless product lines including wearables. This includes having an eye to identifying usecase based innovative solutions that enhance user experience. The ability to work with cross functional teams in the modem stack is a must-have skill and the desire to vertically integrate with new usecases and applications is expected as a second nature! Finally, working on perfectly delivering the implementation along with supporting the complete system validation of such solutions is a requirement.
key_qualifications:
Proven understanding of wireless communication, information theory, signal processing and 3GPP Standards (Physical Layer LTE and NR specifications)
Embedded cellular FW/SW programming along with good understanding of communication systems algorithms
Understanding of cellular communication protocols. (Low-Power, Low Latency, High Reliability)
Deep understanding of software engineering principles, and core computer science fundamentals
Good experience with memory constrained Real Time Operating Systems (RTOS) and concurrent programming
Working knowledge of possible cellular modem L1/PHY architectures with emphasis on the HW/SW partitions of communication subsystems including inter-module interfaces
Experience with 4G/5G Modem L1 Control covering PHY procedures and data path timelines, starting from RF transceiver through to higher layer protocol stacks
Excellent skills in low-level programming expertise using C, C++, and assembler, embedded systems proficiency, limited and shared resources
Experience with SW prototyping of solutions using unit test/virtual platforms
Proficiency debugging embedded software systems using various methods including log analysis and using test equipments
Passionate and inquisitive, and seek to solve everyday problems in innovative ways.
Laser-focused on the smallest details that are important to our customers
education_experience:
Bachelor's Degree in Electrical Engineering, Telecommunications or Equivalent.

Masters or PhD Degree preferred
